title: 970 79 "Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!"Transliteration: "Kanashiki Shirase – Dai Kaizoku Jidai Makuake" (Japanese:悲しき知らせ 大海賊時代幕開け) Yusuke Suzuki Akiko Inoue Masayuki Takagi April 18, 2021(2021-04-18)
transformers_text: 970 79 Sad News The Opening of the Great Pirate Era Transliteration Kana shiki S hira se Dai Kai z oku Jidai Mak u a ke Japanese Yusuke Suzuki Akiko Inoue Masayuki Takagi April 18 2021 2021 04 18 Oden charges to the Flower Capital to confront Orochi cutting down anyone who tries to stop him He then tries to attack Orochi but blocked by Semi maru's Bari Bari Fruit ability and learns that Orochi had Hi gura shi take Sukiyaki's appearance to make himself the next shogun Citizens outside cheered on Oden to save the country but they were struck with poisoned arrows that rained down from the sky before Kai do arrives at the capital in his dragon form After his conversation with Orochi Oden would dance in his underwear in front of the castle once a week For this weird behaviour the citizens started believing him to be a fool and stopped respecting him with the children also ridiculed him His retainers question him for answers but Oden doesn't tell them A year later Oden receives a newspaper from the outside world from the shogun's messenger and learns of Roger's execution White beard having also learned of Roger's death thinks back to his final meeting with Roger who tells him about the Will of D Meanwhile Oden runs to the seacoast crying and laughing praising Roger for the life he lived
tf_idf_text: sad news open great pirate era transliteration kana shiki hira dai kai oku jidai mak japanese yusuke suzuki akiko inoue masayuki takagi april oden charge flower capital confront orochi cut anyone try stop try attack orochi block semi marus bari bari fruit ability learn orochi gura shi take sukiyakis appearance make next shogun citizen outside cheered oden save country strike poisoned arrow rain sky kai arrive capital dragon form conversation orochi oden would dance underwear front castle week weird behaviour citizen start believe fool stop respect child also ridicule retainer question answer oden doesnt tell year later oden receives newspaper outside world shogun messenger learn rogers execution white beard also learn rogers death think back final meeting roger tell meanwhile oden run seacoast cry laugh praise roger life live
